1 = 1
10 = 2              11 = 3
100 = 4             111 = 7
1000 = 8            1111 = 15
10000 = 16          11111 = 31
100000 = 32         111111 = 63
1000000 = 64        1111111 = 127
10000000 = 128      11111111 = 255
100000000 = 256


255 - 240 = 15
11111111 -
00001111
----------
11110000 = 240

255 - 248 = 7
11111111 -
00000111
---------
11111000 = 248

255 - 192 = 63
11111111 -
00111111
----------
11000000 = 192


/20 = 20 1's
11111111.11111111.11110000.00000000 = 16 + 32 + 64 + 128 = 80 + 160 = 240
255.255.240.0

/22 = 22 1's
11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000 = 4 + 8 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128 = 240 + 12 = 252
255.255.252.0

/27 = 27 1's
11111111.11111111.11111111.11100000 = 32 + 64 + 128 = 160 + 64 = 224
255.255.255.224
